item.title: LION’S CUP – YOU´RE GONNA HEAR ME ROAR
item.author: Angela Sun,
item.description: What does a 7:20am start, battle crying, and Nando’s have in common? A taekwondo tournament weekend, that’s what. On the 11th of February, seven ICU Taekwondo competitors brought home five gold medals, one silver, and one bronze from the Lion’s Cup Taekwondo Tournament, held at Nottingham Trent …
